assessment_item.title: 7R3M95-Q14-செயற்கை முறையற்ற ஊடகம் ________ என்றும் அழைக்கப்படுகிறது.
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

செயற்கை முறையற்ற ஊடகம் ________ என்றும் அழைக்கப்படுகிறது.

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

எளிமை ஊடகம்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:4199"},{"text":"

சிக்கலான ஊடகம்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:4200"},{"text":"

இவை  அனைத்தும்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:4210"},{"text":"

 எளிமை ஊடகம்,சிக்கலான ஊடகம்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:4215"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"7R3M95-Q14-செயற்கை முறையற்ற ஊடகம் ________ என்றும் அழைக்கப்படுகிறது.","title":"7R3M95-Q14-செயற்கை முறையற்ற ஊடகம் ________ என்றும் அழைக்கப்படுகிறது.","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Microbiology","qlevel":"MEDIUM","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
